noun.description: Graceful and elegant bearing in a person.
examples: poise and good deportment can be cultivated

verb.description: Be or cause to be balanced or suspended.
examples: he poised motionless on his toes
the world was poised between peace and war

origin: Early 20th century: from the name of Jean L. M. Poiseuille (1799â€“1869), French physician.
